page.title: 12HOW I SPEND MY DAY
page.content: Today, the 25th June 1985, I got up at 7.00 am. I fed my fishes and my gerbil and went to do some viola practice.For breakfast I had 2 slices of bread and a bowl of cornflakes.I did my hair and went to school. At school we sorted out sports day and I have been entered in the 75m sprint. After watching 'Zig Zag' on the T.V. we did our maths and English and went for dinner.I had salad sandwiches and a drink of milk. After dinner we continued with our 'castle' project work and tidied our desks for parents evening. After school I went shopping with my mum and I bought a new pair of shoes and then went home for dinner. After dinner I played with Tracy.I came back and cleaned out the gerbil cage. Then I had supper and went to bed.
